Body:
data = ruamel.yaml.comments.CommentedMap()
ConfigEntry(required=True, default=5, key_name='key_no_comment').set_default(
    data, CFG_LOWER)
ConfigEntry(required=True, default=5, key_name='key_comment', description=
    'Description').set_default(data, CFG_LOWER)
tmp = io.StringIO()
ruamel.yaml.YAML().dump(data, tmp)
output = tmp.getvalue()
assert output == """key_no_comment: 5
key_comment: 5  # Description
"""
